entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
